Class ec.cosm.costume.PresentationElement 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Class ec.cosm.costume.PresentationElement 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.cosm.costume.PresentationElement
public class PresentationElement
extends Object
implements RtCodeable
Class used by PresentationAlgorithm as an intermediate format. Some PresentationAlgorithm methods require or return objects of this class.

artURL
Where to find the art for this element.
attachmentPoint
Which registration point in this container to attach this piece of art to, and the offset from the top-left corner of the image to the registration point.
color
What color to colorize this art with.
flipX
True if the art should be flipped horizontally.
flipY
True if the art should be flipped vertically.
imagePoint
The actual coordinate to draw this piece of art (top-left corner).
originatingCostume
Costume that this art came from.
originatingSegmentName
Segment that this art came from.
rotation
How many degrees clockwise the art for this cel should be rotated.
textureURL
Where to find the texture to texture-map this art with.

PresentationElement()

classNameToEncode(RtEncoder)
decode(RtDecoder)
encode(RtEncoder)
newPresentationElement()
Returns a PresentationElement, using a recycled one if possible, else creating a new one.
returnPresentationElement(PresentationElement)
Returns a PresentationElement for later reuse.

artURL 
  public String artURL
Where to find the art for this element.
attachmentPoint 
  public RegistrationPoint attachmentPoint
Which registration point in this container to attach this piece of art to, and the offset from the top-left corner of the image to the registration point. This information is used to help determine the imagePoint.
imagePoint 
  public Point imagePoint
The actual coordinate to draw this piece of art (top-left corner). This is computed and set by the Presentation.
color 
  public Color color
What color to colorize this art with.
textureURL 
  public String textureURL
Where to find the texture to texture-map this art with.
rotation 
  public int rotation
How many degrees clockwise the art for this cel should be rotated.
flipX 
  public boolean flipX
True if the art should be flipped horizontally.
flipY 
  public boolean flipY
True if the art should be flipped vertically.
originatingCostume 
  public Costume originatingCostume
Costume that this art came from. This can be used for hit-testing
originatingSegmentName 
  public String originatingSegmentName
Segment that this art came from. This can be used for hit-testing

PresentationElement 
  public PresentationElement()

newPresentationElement 
  public static PresentationElement newPresentationElement()
Returns a PresentationElement, using a recycled one if possible, else creating a new one.
returnPresentationElement 
  public static void returnPresentationElement(PresentationElement pe)
Returns a PresentationElement for later reuse. Call this only when you are completely finished accessing the PresentationElement.
classNameToEncode 
  public String classNameToEncode(RtEncoder encoder)
encode 
  public void encode(RtEncoder encoder)
decode 
  public Object decode(RtDecoder decoder)
